title: Podcast 362: The science of soulmates
description:
Sign up to Patreon to get access to bonus ad-free podcasts, exclusive downloads, live Q&As and more: https://www.patreon.com/drcarolineleaf


EPISODE DESCRIPTION: In this podcast I talk about the difference between a significant other and a soulmate. A soulmate is word we use to describe a human bond that involves a deep and satisfying sense of peace and connection. We literally wire this connection with our mind over time (our mind is our “aliveness”, that is our ability to think, feel and choose) into our brain, body and mind.

Read the show blog here: https://drleaf.com/blogs/news/soulmates


OFFERS FROM OUR SPONSORS:

-Public Goods: Receive $15 off your first Public Goods order with NO MINIMUM purchase. Just go to https://www.publicgoods.com/DRLEAF.

-Catalina Crunch: See why Catalina Crunch Cereal is the fastest growing cereal brand in America. Just go to catalinacrunch.com/DRLEAF for 15% off your first order—plus FREE shipping.

-Ritual’s Essential Protein: Are you ready to shake up your protein Ritual? My listeners get 10% off during their first 3 months at ritual.com/DRLEAF. Ritual even offers a money-back guarantee if you’re not 100% in love!


EPISODE HIGHLIGHTS:

1:28, 11:10 The difference between a soulmate & a significant other

2:50, 4:44 What deep, meaningful connections look like in the brain & body

8:40, 12:45 Why love will look different for each of us—there is no “one way” to find a soulmate

15:20 Do what works for you, find love in your own idiosyncratic way & be kind to yourself

16:50 The importance of accepting the highs & lows in life


Get my new book Cleaning up Your Mental Mess here: https://www.cleaningupyourmentalmess.com

Download my new and improved brain detox app here: https://neurocycle.app
